volunteer_experience.info:
Angel Xpress Foundation is a Mumbai-based non-profit organization; working towards empowering the educated affluent with the desire to give back with a means to do so in an impactful manner for the betterment of underprivileged children living in slum areas.My role as a volunteer included teaching mathematics and science to a class of 20-30 underprivileged students of standard 8th and 9th. The course syllabus is structured not only to cover the students' examination syllabus but also to‚Ä¶
            

    
    

    
        Show more

          
    
  
      

        
          Angel Xpress Foundation is a Mumbai-based non-profit organization; working towards empowering the educated affluent with the desire to give back with a means to do so in an impactful manner for the betterment of underprivileged children living in slum areas.My role as a volunteer included teaching mathematics and science to a class of 20-30 underprivileged students of standard 8th and 9th. The course syllabus is structured not only to cover the students' examination syllabus but also to help them apply the learnings in real life scenarios.
            

    
    

    
        Show less
